Yes, it is definitely possible to take a Macanese cooking class while you are visiting Macao. There are several cooking schools and restaurants that offer classes in Macanese cuisine, and these classes are typically taught by experienced chefs who specialize in the local cuisine.

Here are a few options:

1. Macau Cooking Studio: Located in central Macao, the Macau Cooking Studio offers cooking classes in a variety of cuisines, including Macanese, Chinese, and Portuguese. Classes are taught by experienced chefs and can accommodate both small and large groups.

2. Cheoc Van Kitchen: This restaurant is located on Hac Sa Beach in Coloane, and they offer cooking classes that focus on authentic Macanese cuisine. The classes are taught by experienced chefs, and they are suitable for beginners and experienced cooks alike.

3. Macau Gourmet Kitchen: This cooking school offers hands-on classes in Macanese cuisine, as well as Chinese and Portuguese cuisine. Classes are taught by professional chefs and are held in a fully equipped kitchen.

Attending a cooking class will not only allow you to learn how to make some of your favourite dishes but also give you an opportunity to immerse yourself in the Macanese culture and connect with local people.
